text:
Kit Number 2
ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
We wish to express our appreciation to the following:
Mrs, Terrell Webb, for permission to use, as a basis
for the eighth grade social studies lesson, material
from the classic historical reference, THE GREAT
FRONTIER, written by the late Dr, Walter Pres¬
cott Webb, and published by University of Texas
Press, Austin,
Mrs, Myrtle Bagwell Boyce, Assistant Instructional
Coordinator, KLRN-TV, and Research Assistant,
Applications Research Branch, Research and Devel¬
opment Center in Teacher Education, The University
of Texas, for evaluation and advice during prepara¬
tion of the film script.
Dr, L, C, Howard, Principal, Lucy B, Reed Ele¬
mentary School, and Dr. Fred H. Matthys, Prin¬
cipal, Lanier Junior-Senior High School, Austin,
Texas, for cooperation and assistance in film
production.
Mrs, Linda Schmid, Television Teacher, and David
O'Keefe, Television Producer-Director, for the de¬
sign of the art lesson on kites, from which the
excerpt in this film was taken.
Miss Aida Barrera, Television Teacher, and Hugh
Greene,Television Producer-Director, for the de¬
sign of the Spanish lesson, from which the excerpt
in this film was taken.
C-12
